title: Understanding the Learning Facilitation Role of HR Managers Within Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Concepts of Human Resource Management and General Understanding of Organizational Behavior
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining in-person lectures and online data analysis, emphasizing the integration of theory and practice through HR case studies

learning_goals: Explain the four key functions that constitute an HR manager’s role in facilitating learning
Present HR managers’ strategies for building organizational learning environments through case analysis
Assess the practical applicability of HR roles using survey methods and literature analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
